IModelContainerProperties | Methods
 
Packagecom.crazyfm.core.mvc.model
Interfacepublic interface IModelContainer extends IModel, IHierarchyObject, ISignalDispatcher
Implementors ModelContainer

Extends IModel and is able to add or remove other IModel objects (can be parent of them). Also receives all signals from children, sub-children and so on.
